sentences.en: "Gratification" and "gratitude" have the same etymological root.
A feed will usually provide instant gratification to a crying baby.
sentences.cn: 喂食通常可使正在哭闹的婴儿立即得到满足。

sentences.en: Carlo leaned back , his face flushed with gratification.
sentences.cn: 卡罗靠在椅背上,感激涕零, 满面红光.

sentences.en: Corell's eyes were shining with gratification.
sentences.cn: 科雷尔的眼睛闪着得意的光芒.

sentences.en: He always obtained a subtle gratification from eavesdropping.
sentences.cn: 他总觉得背地里听人家说话自有一种说不出的乐趣.

sentences.en: He had the gratification of knowing that he had done his best.
sentences.cn: 他了解自己已尽了最大努力而感到满足.

sentences.en: His son's success was a great gratification to him.
sentences.cn: 他儿子的成功是令他深感快慰的事.

sentences.en: His success is a great gratification to us.
sentences.cn: 他的成功对我们是一大喜事.

sentences.en: Most men live only for the gratification of it.
sentences.cn: 许多人正是终生营营,力求填充自己的欲壑.

sentences.en: So even to-day, when we fail to see the truth of religion, we seek in its observance an artistic gratification.
sentences.cn: 所以，甚至在今天，在我们还看不到宗教的真理时，我们只能从宗教的仪式里去寻求艺术的满足。
这个向导收到了一笔酬金.

sentences.en: There has been an instant of complete startling gratification.
sentences.cn: 内心分明是一阵得意,乐得心花怒放.

sentences.en: They learn the art of delayed gratification, and this helps them later in life.
sentences.cn: 他们很早就学会了延误满足的艺术，这对他们以后的生活很有帮助。

sentences.en: To my immense gratification, he fell into the trap.
sentences.cn: 令我极为满意的是, 他中了圈套.

sentences.en: Tom squeezed his small body behind it in order to illuminate it for Becky's gratification.
sentences.cn: 汤姆挤到后边,好让贝基借着他的灯光看个够.

sentences.en: We live in a culture of instant gratification.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在即时满足的文化中。

sentences.en: You view success in terms of fulfillment and gratification – not just promotions and money.
sentences.cn: 你看重成功带来的满足和喜悦——而不仅仅是升职和金钱。

sentences.en: Your approval gives me much gratification.
Your praise gives me much gratification.

words.tran_cn: 令人满意地；使人满足地
使满意（gratify的现在分词）；使高兴
满意；喜悦；使人满意之事

trans.tran_cn: 满足，满意，喜悦，使人满意之事
